xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.12 Hetuduka, Parittattika » 1.12.3 Appamāṇapada » 1.12.3.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Parittattika
Appamāṇapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
375.
803Hetu appamāṇo dhammo hetussa appamāṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
804Nahetu appamāṇo dhammo nahetussa appamāṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
376.
805Hetu appamāṇo dhammo hetussa appamāṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—  sahajātādhipati…  tīṇi.
806Nahetu appamāṇo dhammo nahetussa appamāṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—  ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati…  tīṇi.
377.
807Hetu appamāṇo dhammo hetussa appamāṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo…  nava…pe… .
808Hetu appamāṇo dhammo hetussa appamāṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—  anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo…  nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
378.
809Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cha, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
